text: Forlì is a city in the region of Emilia-Romagna in Italy. It is the capital of the Province of Forlì-Cesena. About 110,000 people live in Forli. It has a humid subtropical climate (Cfa in the Koeppen climate classification). Benito Mussolini, dictator of Italy during World War Two, was born near Forli, in Predappio. ==References== Category:Cities in Forlì-Cesena Category:Capital cities in Italy
title: Forlì
